#include <stdio.h>
#define mod 1000000007

int main(void) 
{
        int t;
        scanf("%d",&t);
        while(t--)
        {
                int n;
                scanf("%d",&n);
                unsigned long long int a[n],i,mul=1;
                for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
                {
                        scanf("%llu",&a[i]);
                        a[i]=a[i]%mod;
                        mul=((mul%mod)*a[i])%mod;
                }
                printf("%llu\n",mul);
        }
	return 0;
}
